org.eclipse.eef.core.internal.controllers

Class EEFLabelController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.eef.core.api.controllers.AbstractEEFController
      • org.eclipse.eef.core.api.controllers.AbstractEEFWidgetController
        • org.eclipse.eef.core.internal.controllers.EEFLabelController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEEFController, IEEFLabelController, IEEFWidgetController

    public class EEFLabelController
extends AbstractEEFWidgetController
implements IEEFLabelController
    This class will be used in order to manage the behavior of the label.
